subject: AI & Agents
title: The Three Types of Machine Learning
description: A 60-second lesson on The Three Types of Machine Learning.

hook.text: There are three ways machines learn: from answers, from patterns, and from rewards.

buildup.text: Supervised learning uses labeled data. Unsupervised learning finds hidden patterns. RL uses rewards.

discovery.text: Spam detection is supervised. Customer segmentation is unsupervised. Game-playing is reinforcement.

twist.text: Modern systems often combine all three â€” pre-train unsupervised, fine-tune supervised, align with RL.

climax.text: ChatGPT uses all three in sequence: pre-training, instruction tuning, then RLHF.

punchline.text: The best learners use every method available.

quiz.question: What are the three main types of machine learning?
